column6: INHUMANITY TIE-IN! – IRON METROPOLITAN PART THREE! Who will be the next MANDARIN?! Will an INHUMAN threaten Tony and Arno's plan to build the city of tomorrow? More mysteries of the rings revealed!!!
column8: | artist:Joe Bennett | writer:Kieron Gillen | penciller (cover):Paul Rivoche
column16: The skies burn red above IRON METROPOLITAN as the IRON PHALANX faces MANDARIN-SEVEN: RED PERIL. Wait... how on Earth did the Mandarin's rings in these dangerous hands anyway? Guest starring: JIM RHODES: IRON PATRIOT.
column18: | artist:Joe Bennett | writer:Kieron Gillen | penciller (cover):Paul Rivoche
